channel.title: [PI] Fight Caves - Make it start without relogging
channel.description:
Hello, before I start asking for this help, I want you to understand I am new to this. I am trying to learn to code servers and I'm stuck on this. Please don't flame, just help. And if you can't, don't bother posting.
Well, as you can read from the title, I need help with fight caves. I'm using Exion's base and you need to log out in order for fight caves to start. I have looked for fixes on google but all I find is fixes that require the Cycle-based Task Manager by Graham. I've tried to follow and understand his tutorial but I seem to be getting stuck. Can you possibly spoon feed me how to add the cycle-based task manager or come up with a fix that does not require it.
Thank-you for your time :)
-(newfag) RegalX

item.title: [PI] Fight Caves - Make it start without relogging
item.dc:creator: @RegalX RegalX
item.description:

Hello, before I start asking for this help, I want you to understand I am new to this. I am trying to learn to code servers and I’m stuck on this. Please don’t flame, just help. And if you can’t, don’t bother posting.
